question: You are going to another country to study. You would like to do a part-time job while you are studying, so you want to ask a friend who lives there for some help. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter: give details of your study plans explain why you want to get a part-time job suggest how your friend could help you find a job You should write at least 150 words.
text: I know that you heard that I would travel soon to your country. In fact, I got accepted into one of the universities in your town, and I am planning to get a job in parallel to my studies. Therefore, can I have your assistance in this subject?

Actually, I will arrive at the airport next Saturday where a taxi will take me to my student flat inside the campus. Speaking of my domain, I chose to learn more about green energy during a two-years master's degree program, and this university is considered one of the most competitive around the world.

As you know, I am a foreign citizen with a limited budget that could not be sufficient to pay all my costs such as accommodation, tuition fees and other activities. So, working as a part-time employee will be the most convenient option in order to cover my financial needs.
On the other hand, I heard that your father owns a fast-food restaurant. I will much appreciate if you could ask him to find me a position there as a waiter, assistant chef or even a delivery man.
Thank you in advance for your support and affection, I cannot wait until we meet again at your place.
